articles.author: David Goldman
articles.title: Trump warns America’s businesses: Eat my tariffs, or pay the price - CNN
articles.description: President Trump used his bully pulpit to warn America’s businesses about raising prices due to tariffs.
articles.content:
President Donald Trump is sending a stern warning to Corporate America: He will use his bully pulpit to publicly shame companies that dare to raise prices because of tariffs.
After Walmart last week… [+4246 chars]
